properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 2:17AM PST until January 6 at 3:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 10
to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 10 to 12 feet at 13
seconds. For the second Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15
to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 9 to 11 feet at 13
seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the first Small Craft Advisory, until 9 AM PST this
morning. For the second Small Craft Advisory, from 9 PM this
evening to 3 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM PST MONDAY
